#summary Information about how to get the Wikipedia data dumps.

= Wikipedia Dump Repository =
You can find the Wikipedia data dumps on http://dumps.wikimedia.org/

= Download Tool =
You can find a download tool for Wikipedia database dumps at http://github.com/babilen/wp-download/

It can be used for bulk downloads of the latest dump files of all wanted languages and supports resume of aborted downloads.

{{{
$ wp-download -v --resume /path/to/wikipedia/dumps
